name: Techno Color [2021]
description: ‘TECHNO COLOR’ IS AN ORIGINAL, SINGLE EDITION VIDEO WORK BY LUKE CONROY. A play with color, form and movement, combined with found footage of dancers in a club. The original collector of this NFT will unlock a personal link to download an exclusive high definition, extended version of this work (coordinate by contacting artist directly @lukefconroy) // NFT details: MP4, 1920x1080 px, 30 seconds, single edition // Original collector exclusive download: MP4, 3840 x 2160 px, 3:00 minutes
